text: Ahmed Soilihi (born 1 July 1996) is a Comorian international footballer who plays for French club Athlético Marseille, as a defender. == Professional career == Soilihi was trained in the youth academy of FC Istres, and moved to Athlético Marseille in the summer of 2017. == International career == Soilihi made his professional debut for the Comoros national football team in a friendly 1–0 win over Mauritania on 6 October 2017. == References == == External links == * * NFT Profile * Comoros Football Profile * LFP Profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Istres Category:Sportspeople from Bouches-du-Rhône Category:Association football defenders Category:Comorian footballers Category:Comoros international footballers Category:French footballers Category:French people of Comorian descent Category:Championnat National players Category:Athlético Marseille players
title: Ahmed Soilihi
